pullrequest.title: Fix force torque unit test issue #813

content.raw:
I ran the commented-out tests using bullet (svn: r2645) compiled with:
~~~
cmake .. -G "Unix Makefiles" \
  -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
  -DUSE_DOUBLE_PRECISION=ON
~~~
I am still reviewing the code changes. I have made some style fixes and reduced some console output in cfeca79 (branch force_torque_test_scpeters). Please consider merging with that branch.

Also don't forget the new quick-check tool: `tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 673`
content.html:
I ran the commented-out tests using bullet (svn: r2645) compiled with:

cmake .. -G "Unix Makefiles" \
  -DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=ON \
  -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Debug \
  -DUSE_DOUBLE_PRECISION=ON

I am still reviewing the code changes. I have made some style fixes and reduced some console output in cfeca79 (branch force_torque_test_scpeters). Please consider merging with that branch.

Also don't forget the new quick-check tool: tools/bitbucket_pullrequests -c 673
